contentrichtext.text: <!-- This article was auto-generated by [[User:Polbot]]. --> {{taxobox |status = VU |status_system = IUCN2.3 |regnum = [[Plant]]ae |unranked_divisio = [[Angiosperm]]s |unranked_classis = [[Magnoliid]]s |ordo = [[Magnoliales]] |familia = [[Annonaceae]] |genus = ''[[Xylopia]]'' |species = '''''X. elliotii''''' |binomial = ''Xylopia elliotii'' |binomial_authority = [[Heinrich Gustav Adolf Engler|Engl.]] |}} '''''Xylopia elliotii''''' is a species of [[plant]] in the [[Annonaceae]] family. It is found in [[Ghana]] and possibly [[Ivory Coast]]. ==Source== * Hawthorne, W. 1998. [http://www.iucnredlist.org/search/details.php/34829/all ''Xylopia elliotii'']. [http://www.iucnredlist.org 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. ] Downloaded on 24 August 2007. [[Category:Xylopia|elliotii]] [[Category:Vulnerable plants]] {{Annonaceae-stub}}
